thread.section_title: Sports: Red Sox & MLB | Boston Herald
thread.title: A look at the Red Sox’ outfield candidates and DH for next season
thread.title_full: A look at the Red Sox’ outfield candidates and DH for next season | Boston Herald

author: Scott Lauber
title: A look at the Red Sox’ outfield candidates and DH for next season
text:
HOLDOVERS
MOOKIE BETTS
Opening Day age: 23
2015 key stats: .291
.341/.479, 18 HR, 77 RBI, 21 SB
Contract status: Under control for about $600,000. Not eligible for salary arbitration.
RUSNEY CASTILLO
Opening Day age: 28
2015 key stats: .253
.288/.359, 5 HR, 29 RBI, 4 SB
Contract status: Will make $10.5 million next year; signed through 2020.
JACKIE BRADLEY JR.
Opening Day age: 25
2015 key stats: .249
.335/.498, 10 HR, 43 RBI, 3 SB
Contract status: Under control for approximately $600,000. Not yet eligible for salary arbitration.
BROCK HOLT
Opening Day age: 27
2015 key stats: .280
.349/.379, 2 HR, 45 RBI, 8 SB
Contract status: Under control for approximately $625,000. Not yet eligible for salary arbitration.
ALLEN CRAIG
Opening Day age: 31
2015 key stats: .152
.239/.203, 1 HR, 3 RBI
Contract status: Will make $9 million next year; signed through 2017 with $13 million option for 2018.
DAVID ORTIZ (DH)
Opening Day age: 40
2015 key stats: .273
.360/.553, 37 HR, 108 RBI
Contract status: Will make $16 million next year; vesting club option for 2017 worth at least $10 million.
I N THE SYSTEM
Bryce Brentz:
232
.308/.382, 8 HR, 26 RBI (Triple-A)
Garin Cecchini:
.213
.286/.296, 7 HR, 28 RBI (Triple-A)
Manuel Margot:
.276
.324/.419, 6 HR, 39 SB (Single-A, Double-A)
Andrew Benintendi:
.313
.416/.556, 11 HR, 10 SB (short-season, low-A)
